metadata.title: CVE-2017-16137 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service whenuntrusted user input is passed into the o formatter. It takes around 50kcharacters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16137` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-debug - 3.1.0-1
node-debug - 3.1.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-debug package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-1').
